LanguageData.Frenzy_Work.label: work frenzy
LanguageData.Frenzy_Work.beginLetter: [PAWN_nameIndef] has experienced an inspiration!\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] will work faster for the next 8 days.
LanguageData.Frenzy_Go.label: go frenzy
LanguageData.Frenzy_Go.beginLetter: [PAWN_nameIndef] has experienced an inspiration!\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] will move faster for the next 8 days.
LanguageData.Frenzy_Shoot.label: shoot frenzy
LanguageData.Frenzy_Shoot.beginLetter: [PAWN_nameIndef] has experienced an inspiration!\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] will shoot more accurately for the next 8 days.
LanguageData.Inspired_Trade.label: inspired trade
LanguageData.Inspired_Trade.beginLetter:
[PAWN_nameIndef] has experienced an inspiration!

[PAWN_pronoun] will get a significant trade price bonus when closing [PAWN_possessive] next trade deal.

The inspiration will expire after 8 days, or when the deal is done.
LanguageData.Inspired_Recruitment.label: inspired recruitment
LanguageData.Inspired_Recruitment.beginLetter:
[PAWN_nameIndef] has experienced an inspiration!

[PAWN_pronoun] will successfully recruit the next prisoner regardless of difficulty or resistance.

The inspiration will end after 8 days, or when the prisoner is recruited.
LanguageData.Inspired_Surgery.label: inspired surgery
LanguageData.Inspired_Surgery.beginLetter:
[PAWN_nameIndef] has experienced an inspiration!

The next time [PAWN_pronoun] performs a surgery, [PAWN_possessive] chance of success will be doubled. A small minimum chance of failure still applies.

The inspiration will end after 8 days, or when the surgery is performed.
LanguageData.Inspired_Creativity.label: inspired creativity
LanguageData.Inspired_Creativity.beginLetter:
[PAWN_nameIndef] has experienced an inspiration!

The next item, art, or furniture [PAWN_pronoun] creates will be two quality levels higher than it would otherwise be. This even allows the creation of legendary items.

The inspiration will end after 8 days, or when the creation is completed.
